post.body: Isn't it actually 8 1/2 months since you're starting early ;)
actually just a whole lot of awesomeness
not sure, waiting to hear any news on my grandfather before I make solid plans.. I'll txt you when I have a better idea
Yup :( Might go catch a movie at the Promenade if you up for it
Thanks for the upgrade to Blackie 2.0!! It morphs to Greenie 1.0 when you go outside and back to Blackie 2.0 when you come back in!
Cute baby pics, you've grown so much!
But it's 2:30
Are you really going to listen to @peteywee , I mean the dude wears a cape and duckie hat .. time for coffee
mmmm coffee ... gotta head there soon
boo hoo, i'm already at the office
How often are you going to be doing these conferences since this has obviously been a big success? #askisrael
What kind of support are you getting from Pres-elect Obama? Will his admin support ISR over the next 4 yrs? #AskIsrael
= Travel FAIL!
Yeh there were some good knock outs but I wasn't happy with the Forrest Rashad fight
Going grocery shopping hungry, I know it's a bad idea but the alternative is pb & j for the 4th night this week ... mmmmm pb & j
Latest episode of The IT crowd is great! Stop whatever you are doing and go watch it now!
Step 1: GET COFFEE Step 2: Clean house
Awesome video display behind Kayne on SNL, I need one of those in my family room.
In love with this painting by Byroglyphics http://tinyurl.com/57vuas to bad it's already sold!
Great UFC tonight, Junie looked awesome so did Krzysztof, Bader and Efrain ... now for some SNL funnies
at st louis picking up some wings ... Smells so good!
hungry ... what to eat? hrmm
about to watch Wristcutters: A Love Story ... http://www.wristcutters.com/
Almost done working for the day, now I'm going to go spend a bunch of money even though I didn't make a cent today
Working @ www.marquisshoes.ca winter sale, 30 - 50% off ... take advantage while we still have some stock
Working retail just doesn't get any more fun after 17 years
Went to a movie last night and some tool behind me kept saying "O! M! G!" whenever something funny happened.. I really wanted to hurt him
Heading to Scotiabank Theatre, that just sounds so wrong, why is an entertainment venue owned by a bank?
Reliving my trip to NZ in a blog I started back in May and haven't touched since .. I'll post links later
I want the Banana Derby at my next birthday party!! http://bananaderby.com/
"Time and silence are the most luxurious things today" - Tom Ford
Want Vs Need .. hrmmmmm http://tinyurl.com/5dxq3x
Finally home, not impressed by the squishy sidewalks along Queen West
The new IT Crowd is by far the best episode ever! About to watch a new episode of Testees, the blind one was pretty funny
Still at hospital ... Third weekend this month spent here ... Hope i don't pick anything up this time
Waiting for an update passing the time with some Sedaris, thanks @erindrew99 .. looks like I might be stuck out in the boonies tonight
I can't feel my legs, time to break out the long johns
My head is killing and I think I'm getting sick, thanks Marc!
Brickstreet Bakery Chicken and Almond soup makes my belly happy.
Yummm just had some scones flown in from London for breakfast ... wish I had more
I'm so full of yummy Indian food I can hardly breath, no for real, it actually hurts to breath
long but productive day at work, time to go have dinner with some friends and head home for a good night of sleep or watch tv and not sleep
Watched some of the Survivor finale .... who really cares anymore?
Gotta love the internet http://tinyurl.com/3h8do4 How else could I get my daily fix of hamsters eating popcorn on a piano?
back alive again, reading 2666 by Roberto Bolano 40 pages down 860 to go http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2666_(novel)
RT @DavidSaranga 'Lets play pretend' - a very powerfull video - I recommend you to watch http://tinyurl.com/9qkr59
Restaurant was closed and it's bitter cold out there.
Going for brunch @ Bar One apparently they have the best french toast ever. I'll report back later with the results.
Watching Boondock Saints until my friends get here, hoping they are late, very late ... like don't show up so I can watch the whole movie.
Shouldn't have made plans to go out tonight, so tired already and it's only 9... guess it's going to be a vodka redbull to the rescue.
Wow an hour and a half just flew by following this conference, time to go do something a bit more productive... get booze for NYE!!!!
Wishing that someone would bust out singing the PB&J time song, give me a sandwich and then get the hell out of my appt
Following @israelconsulate conference on Tweet Grid @ http://tinyurl.com/7hryby
Don't think 2 hrs is going to be long enough for @israelconsulate to answer all of these questions but they're doing a good job trying.
Following @israelconsulate glad to see countries trying to use tech to reach out to ppl but this it's going to takes 2 to end this conflict
First day to sleep in my condo decided to test the fire alarms @ 9am
Done work for the week, time for some much needed R&R .. well as soon as these last customers leave the store I can actually leave.
first floor clean, rethinking the whole two floor loft idea... maybe I can just live on the first floor so I don't have to clean both
Cooking and cleaning and returning to a semi-normal life has never felt so good.
Going to gym for the first time in a month or two or three
